name: GENESIS 1:27 PROOF OF PRE ORDER
description: Thank You for supporting hip-hop. This is a Proof Of Purchase NFT. The Rome Streetz & ANKHLEJOHN "GENESIS 1:27" album is fully produced by Rare Scrilla & Chop La Rock. Artwork by Rare Scrilla. This NFT is being distributed to those that purchased the album on or before June 1, 2021. All NFTs need to be claimed within 60 days of mint. Unclaimed NFTs will be burnt shortly after expiration and will be gone forever. Emails going out to buyers on June 10, 2021. This is an experiment in rewarding early supporters with some documentation of their great taste. This is an experiment in bridging hip-hop x NFTs
